name: Doors & Rooms - House
description:
Trapped in this house behind the door locked with 7 keys makes you feel claustrophobic. Unfortunately the only way out is through the front door.
Start this escaping adventure filled with mini-puzzles, combining items and smartphone magic!
Go on, it's time to escape!
- Features -
> Challenging logic puzzles
> Beautiful graphics
> Easy to start – hard to put down
> Smartphone's magic

- How to play -
> Find and use items
> Solve mini-puzzles
> Use your device if you want (tilting and shaking)
